item.title: Congratulations Dr. Irina Khven!
item.description: We are delighted to announce that Irina Khven has successfully defended her PhD thesis! Irina’s thesis, “Fine-grained mapping of neural progenitors subtypes in the embryonic brain unveils context-dependent roles of signalling on cell fate decisions,” represents a major contribution to our understanding of brain development. During her PhD in the EDNE program (2019-2025), Irina made fundamental contributions to mapping neural progenitor diversity using spatial transcriptomics and single-cell approaches. Her work has been instrumental in establishing the lab’s spatial transcriptomics capabilities and generating some of the most comprehensive datasets on embryonic brain development.
